title: Before the Coffee Gets Cold
author: Toshikazu Kawaguchi
description: Before the Coffee Gets Cold is a 2015 novel by Toshikazu Kawaguchi. It tells of a café in Tokyo that allows its customers to travel back in time, as long as they return before their coffee gets cold.
location: kudrat bhaban, balughat bazar, dhaka cantonment, 1206

title: Nilin
author: Mostaque Ahamed
description: Nilin is the first human clone in the world. Professor Rahman created in Bangladesh. The entire project was very secretive. The project is funded by a foreign pharmaceutical research firm called Dedilin. Before the nineteen -year -old golden green hair was unveiled in front of everyone, the Dedillin company claimed that Nilin would have to be handed over to them and said they would research Nilin.
location: annex hall room (1st floor), supreme court bar association building, 1000

title: Serina
author: Zafar Iqbal
description: Alex suddenly said in a loud voice, Look Shamim. Evolution for people is being evolved, mutation is happening. So it is not impossible to do anything very strange. We do not see these strange examples because these mutations do not survive. Four meters of blood vessels in a square inch of the human skin, if they somehow can make oxygen through the skin cells, may even breathe with the skin. The fish takes oxygen from the water with its flower-
location: (asstt. professor of paediatrics) m. a. g. osmani medical college, sylhet, sylhet, 3100

title: Manuser Golpo
author: Ahsfaq Ahmed
description: Telling a story is a very difficult task. Very few people can do it. When we are ordinary people see a tree, stone or shrub, it is a tree, stone or climber. But when Vibhutibhushan sees the same plant, it becomes a wonderful story between dreams and reality. We see a unemployed, wandering boy every day to chat in the tea shop, walking the streets alone.

title: একাত্তরের দিনগুলি
author: Jahanara Imam
description: In 1971, the Jahanara Imam declared solidarity with the movement to establish the independence of Bengal. During the War of Liberation, death, nightmare, his sacrifice and alert activism have become the highest example of patriotism. Shaheed Rumi's mother became a martyr's mother. In the War of Liberation, the pain of the child of the child has been centered on him.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A million years ago, at least six human tribes lived on earth. Currently only one lives. We Homo sapiens-ray. How did our species succeed in the fight for domination? Why did our hunter-collectors come together to unite and build cities and states? How do we believe in gods, nations, and human rights? How did I get confident of money, books, books, and laws? How did I take bureaucracy, schedule and consumerism? How will this world look like in the coming millenniums?

title: নির্বাসন
author: Humayun Ahamed
description: The impact of the War of Liberation in Bengali life is found in the novel. Anis and fairy's dreams were broken when Anis became crippled in the liberation war. So even as a romantic novel, a kind of grief, as well as the depiction of freedom of independence.

title: Mahanadi : The Tale of a River
author: Anita Agnihotri
description: One of the largest rivers of India, Mahanadi originates from the foothills of the Sihaoa mountain of Chhattisgarh and flows for a thousand kilometres through Chhattisgarh and Odisha, finally immersing in the Bay of Bengal at Jagatsinghpur.

title: Madonna Vibrations Echoes
author: Hasna Begum
description: Mahua, the Madonna in this story, convinced of the reality of her being, finds that the society and realization of her individual potentiality are in direct conflict with each other. Al though giving way without outward resistance to the dictates of the male dominated society the girl takes upon herself the challenge of proving her worth as a complete individual. The Madonna in woman forms a part of the core and meaning of humankind itself. Woman flourishes in full glory as 'person' accepting and cultivating this aspect. This is what mahua hopes for and struggles to prove through her life.

title: দৈনন্দিন জীবনে প্রিয় নবীর সুন্নাতসমূহ
author: মাওলানা হাকীম মুহাম্মদ আখতার ছাহেব (রহ.)
description: ইসলামে সুন্নাহও সুন্নাকে বানান করেছেন, তিনি হলেন ইসলামী হযরত মুহাম্মদের ঐতিহ্য এবং অনুশীলন যা মুসলমানদের অনুসরণ করার জন্য একটি মডেল গঠন করে। সুন্নাহ হ'ল মুহাম্মদের সময়ের সমস্ত মুসলমান স্পষ্টতই দেখেছিলেন এবং অনুসরণ করেছিলেন এবং পরবর্তী প্রজন্মের কাছে চলে গিয়েছিলেন।

title: ঈমানের দুর্বলতা
author: শাইখ মুহাম্মাদ সালেহ আল মুনাজ্জিদ
description: একজন মুসলমানের কাছে সবচেয়ে মূল্যবান বস্তু হলো তার ঈমান। আর এই ঈমান আমাদের জীবনের বিভিন্ন পর্যায় বা পরিস্থিতিতে এমনকি প্রতিদিনের নেয়া বিভিন্ন সিদ্ধান্তের উপর বাড়ে বা কমে। আবার অনেকে এক পর্যায়ে গিয়ে ঈমান হারাও হয়ে যায়। এটাই আমাদের আক্বিদা। ঈমান কোনো স্থীর জিনিস নয়। এর পরিচর্যা করতে হয়, একে সংরক্ষণ করতে হয়।

title: কীভাবে নামাজের মধুরতা লাভ করা যায়?
author: মিশারী আল-খারাজ
description: আমরা প্রতিদিন নামাজ আদায় করি। আসছে বিশেষ রামাদান মাসে নামাজের মাধ্যমে আল্লাহর সাথে ঘনিষ্ঠ সম্পর্ক করার ও অসীম সাওয়াবের মাধ্যমে হয়ে দাঁড়ায় নামাজের ইবাদাত। সেই ইবাদাতের মধুরতা ও পুরো সাওয়াবের কোনো কমতি যেন না থাকে সেটা যেন নিশ্চিত করতে পারি আমরা। সেজন্য নামাজের প্রশান্তি ও শীতলতা দরকার। এ নিয়েই বইটি।

title: GST গুচ্ছ এইড বিজ্ঞান শাখা ভর্তি সহায়িকা - A ইউনিট
author: জয়কলি সম্পাদনা পরিষদ (সম্পাদক)
description: There is no alternative to good books as a lesson to make yourself a good reflection in the admission test of intense rewarding university admission test. Sadly, it is true that the science department in the bunch of admission tests is not a full guide book in the corner for the students, so the students are able to achieve the results in the admission test. Therefore, considering the students of the Komalamati students, the book Aid Science Department of my small attempt to meet the lack of a good book for the science department is published- which will be remembered as a milestone for the examinations of the University admission test. My firm belief that the book will play a hundred percent contributing to the science department in the bunch of admission tests.

title: ICT Express
author: Md. Jonayed Hossain
description: There is no alternative to good books as a lesson to make yourself a good reflection in the admission test of intense rewarding university admission test. Sadly, it is true that the science department in the bunch of admission tests is not a full guide book in the corner for the students, so the students are able to achieve the results in the admission test.

title: BUET Math (1st & 2nd)
author: Salauddin Ahmed/Shafiqur Rahman/Medehi Hasan/Sayid Hasan
description: As an examiner, I came to take the engineering admission test and I felt the intense lack of a quality and dependent guide book for the admission test. Finally, we have tried our best to compose and enhance the BUET-mathematical book, the real experience of our teacher's life, the help of numerous students and well-wishers, and the inspiration of the publisher. Our conviction book will play a supportive role in meeting the needs of the students who are BUET-Kuet-Chuette-Ruet admission.
